summary: Every 2 years, we examine federal programs and operations that are especially vulnerable to waste, fraud, abuse, and mismanagement, or that need transformative change—our High Risk List. This report reviews the status of areas on the list and outlines steps to lasting solutions. This year, we added 3 areas, expanded 2 existing ones, and found many areas still in need of substantial attention. Yet, a...
title: High-Risk Series: Progress on Many High-Risk Areas, While Substantial Efforts Needed on Others
